description: Identify top 30 most expensive datastreams across all deployments

configuration.query:
FROM billing_cluster_cost_lookup
| LOOKUP JOIN chargeback_conf_lookup ON @timestamp >= conf_start_date AND @timestamp <= conf_end_date
| LOOKUP JOIN cluster_deployment_contribution_lookup ON composite_key
| LOOKUP JOIN cluster_datastream_contribution_lookup ON composite_key
| EVAL indexing = CASE(deployment_sum_indexing_time > 0, TO_DOUBLE(datastream_sum_indexing_time) / deployment_sum_indexing_time * total_ecu, 0),
        querying = CASE(deployment_sum_query_time > 0, TO_DOUBLE(datastream_sum_query_time) / deployment_sum_query_time * total_ecu, 0),
        data_set = CASE(deployment_sum_data_set_store_size > 0, TO_DOUBLE(datastream_sum_data_set_store_size) / deployment_sum_data_set_store_size * total_ecu, 0),
        store = CASE(deployment_sum_store_size > 0, TO_DOUBLE(datastream_sum_store_size) / deployment_sum_store_size * total_ecu, 0)
| EVAL storage = CASE(store == 0, data_set, store)
| EVAL blended_cost = ((storage * conf_storage_weight) + (querying * conf_query_weight) + (indexing * conf_indexing_weight)) / (conf_storage_weight + conf_query_weight + conf_indexing_weight) * conf_ecu_rate
| STATS total_cost = SUM(blended_cost), avg_storage = AVG(datastream_sum_store_size) BY datastream
| SORT total_cost DESC
| LIMIT 30
